title: Actions
excerpt: The main actions a character can take on their turn, such as Attack, Dash, Disengage, and more.

subEntries.title: One Thing at a Time
subEntries.excerpt: The game uses actions to govern how much you can do at one time. You can take only one action at a time. This principle is most important in combat.

subEntries.title: Bonus Actions
subEntries.excerpt: An additional action on your turn, which can only be taken when a special ability, spell, or other feature says you can.

subEntries.title: Reactions
